PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
### PR summary [087a51ebcd](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13162/commits/087a51ebcd81f9a8842f177212b4362b4ec340e9)

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ EssFiniteType`
`+ EssFiniteType.adjoin_mem_finset`
`+ EssFiniteType.algHom_ext`
`+ EssFiniteType.aux`
`+ EssFiniteType.baseChange`
`+ EssFiniteType.comp`
`+ EssFiniteType.comp_iff`
`+ EssFiniteType.finset`
`+ EssFiniteType.isLocalization`
`+ EssFiniteType.of_comp`
`+ EssFiniteType.of_finiteType`
`+ EssFiniteType.of_id`
`+ EssFiniteType.of_isLocalization`
`+ EssFiniteType.submonoid`
`+ essFiniteType_cond_iff`
`+ essFiniteType_iff`
`+ essFiniteType_iff_exists_subalgebra`
`+ instance [EssFiniteType R S] : Algebra.FiniteType R (EssFiniteType.subalgebra R S) := by`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>

Thanks!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9817404797/job/27108732964)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9817404797/job/27108732839)
Thanks, looks good to me. I'll go advertise it on Zulip.
Thanks, looks good to me. I'll go advertise it on Zulip.

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion IsLocalization ((IsUnit.submonoid S).comap (algebraMap (Algebra.adjoin R (σ : Set S)) S)) S ↔ ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion EssFiniteType R S ↔ ∃ (σ : Finset S), ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion IsLocalization ((IsUnit.submonoid S).comap (algebraMap (Algebra.adjoin R (σ : Set S)) S)) S ↔ ```
Could you please copy this docstring into the module docstring?

I think from this you can get
```lean
lemma essFiniteType_iff' : EssFiniteType R S ↔
    ∃ (S₀ : Subalgebra R S) (_ : FiniteType R S₀) (M : Submonoid S₀), IsLocalization M S := by
  sorry
```
which I think could be useful and which I would have even chosen as definition of `EssFiniteType` as it looks easier to parse for my eyes.
I added `essFiniteType_iff_exists_subalgebra`.

```suggestion
      simpa only [Submonoid.coe_comap, OneMemClass.coe_one, one_mul] using Subtype.ext e
```

```suggestion
instance EssFiniteType.of_finiteType [Algebra.FiniteType R S] : EssFiniteType R S := by
  obtain ⟨s, hs⟩ := ‹Algebra.FiniteType R S›
```
to avoid the named instance parameter (similarly at other places).
I don't think it is possible on other occasions because I need to rewrite on them.
Do we need this if it is by `inferInstance`?
I think it is still nice to have, in case someone wants to refer to this result.

```suggestion
  intro _
  simpa only [hs, mem_top, and_true, true_and] using ⟨1, isUnit_one⟩
```

```suggestion
  refine Algebra.adjoin_induction ht ?_ ?_ ?_ ?_ <;> clear ht t
```
I think `refine'` is being phased out?
This seems to be the doc string from `EssFiniteType.subalgebra`, but it should be something like "A choice of a submonoid of the subalgebra ..."

```suggestion
    refine Algebra.adjoin_induction' ?_ ?_ ?_ ?_ x
```

I think the statement
```lean
adjoin R {x | ↑x ∈ finset R S} = ⊤
```
could be useful on its own, so maybe state this as a lemma above?

```suggestion
    have H (x : S) (hx : x ∈ Algebra.adjoin R (σ : Set S)) :
        1 ⊗ₜ[R] x ∈ Algebra.adjoin T
          ((σ.image Algebra.TensorProduct.includeRight : Finset (T ⊗[R] S)) : Set (T ⊗[R] S)) := by
```
Should this be called `EssFiniteType.comp_iff`? (`of_comp` indicates an hypothesis to me).

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(RingTheory/EssentialFiniteness): Define essentially of finite type algebras
